traits.name: Brutal Critical
entries: When Grog scores a critical hit, he rolls double weapon damage dice as usual, then rolls 3 additional weapon damage dice.

traits.name: Feral Instinct
entries: Grog has {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|advantage} on initiative rolls.

traits.name: Melee Master
entries: Grog can take a âˆ’5 penalty to any melee attack roll to gain a +10 bonus to the damage roll.

traits.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of his turn, Grog can gain {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|advantage} on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|advantage} until the start of his next turn.

traits.name: Relentless Rage
entries: If Grog is reduced to 0 hit points while raging, he drops to 1 hit point instead if he succeeds on a {@dc 10} Constitution {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw}.

traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: Grog wears a {@item belt of dwarvenkind}. He wields the {@item Bloodaxe|EGW} (a +2 magic weapon), a {@item dwarven thrower}, and the {@item Titanstone Knuckles (Exalted)|TDCSR|Titanstone Knuckles}.

traits.name: Spellbreaker
entries: When Grog damages a creature that is concentrating on a spell, that creature has {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|disadvantage} on the {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} to maintain its {@condition concentration}. In addition, Grog has {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|advantage} on {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1} against spells cast by creatures within 5 feet of him.

traits.name: Toughness
entries: Grog has an additional 40 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Grog makes two attacks (three when raging) with his {@item Bloodaxe|EGW}, {@item dwarven thrower}, or {@item Titanstone Knuckles (Exalted)|TDCSR|Titanstone Knuckles}.

actions.name: {@item Bloodaxe|EGW}
entries: Melee atk +16 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 20 (1d12 + 14 damage) slashing damage and 3 (1d6 damage) necrotic damage. If the target is reduced to 0 hit points, Grog gains 10 temporary hit points.

actions.name: {@item Dwarven Thrower}
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +17 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60, one target. 24 (2d8 + 15 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Titanstone Knuckles
entries: Melee atk +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (1d4 + 12 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|Long Rest})
entries: Grog casts {@spell enlarge/reduce} on himself to grow in size for 10 minutes. While enlarged in this way, he has resistance to cold, fire, lightning, and thunder damage.
